jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、先生もいますし
出遅れちゃったみたいですね。

engChrName: Not at all. You came at the perfect time.
engSearchText: Not at all. You came at the perfect time.
jpnChrName: フフ、２人とも良き所に来たな。
jpnSearchText: フフ、２人とも良き所に来たな。

engChrName: Nice going, Elaine. Looks like you didn't arrive a minute too soon.
engSearchText:
Nice going, Elaine. Looks like you didn't arrive a
minute too soon.
jpnChrName: お疲れ、エレイン。 良いタイミングだったみたいだね？
jpnSearchText:
お疲れ、エレイン。
良いタイミングだったみたいだね？

engChrName: We could hear the fighting while we were on our way here.
engSearchText:
We could hear the fighting while we were on our
way here.
jpnChrName: フフ、微かに剣戟が響いてたが。
jpnSearchText: フフ、微かに剣戟が響いてたが。

engChrName: Bet you and your old friends worked together like a dream, huh?
engSearchText:
Bet you and your old friends worked together like a
dream, huh?
jpnChrName: どうやら幼馴染み同士、 上手く連携できたみたいじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
どうやら幼馴染み同士、
上手く連携できたみたいじゃないか？

engChrName: A nice enough dream, I suppose... Why are you looking at me like that?
engSearchText:
A nice enough dream, I suppose... Why are you
looking at me like that?
jpnChrName: まあ、それなりには…… ──って、何ですかその目は？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それなりには……
──って、何ですかその目は？

engChrName: Like what?
engSearchText: Like what?
jpnChrName: いや別に？
jpnSearchText: いや別に？

engChrName: You're just imagining it.
engSearchText: You're just imagining it.
jpnChrName: 気のせい、気のせい。
jpnSearchText: 気のせい、気のせい。

engChrName: Reporting in, sir!
engSearchText: Reporting in, sir!
jpnChrName: 補佐官、お疲れ様です！
jpnSearchText: 補佐官、お疲れ様です！

engChrName: Are those the rest of their members?
engSearchText: Are those the rest of their members?
jpnChrName: そちらが残りのメンバーですね？
jpnSearchText: そちらが残りのメンバーですね？

engChrName: Correct. Take them into custody. This should be the last of them.
engSearchText:
Correct. Take them into custody. This should be the
last of them.
jpnChrName: ああ、拘束しろ。 数は合っているはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、拘束しろ。
数は合っているはずだ。

engChrName: Yes, sir!
engSearchText: Yes, sir!
jpnChrName: イエス・サー！
jpnSearchText: イエス・サー！

engChrName: *sigh* Feels to me like we were never needed here.
engSearchText: *sigh* Feels to me like we were never needed here.
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ。 俺たちが動くまでもなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
……やれやれ。
俺たちが動くまでもなかったか？

engChrName: Oh, I'm sure that's not true.
engSearchText: Oh, I'm sure that's not true.
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… そんなこと、ないと思います。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
そんなこと、ないと思います。

engChrName: We were able to lure out the bulk of Almata's remaining forces, after all.
engSearchText:
We were able to lure out the bulk of Almata's
remaining forces, after all.
jpnChrName: ええ、アルマータの残党も 大半が炙り出せたようですし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、アルマータの残党も
大半が炙り出せたようですし。

engChrName: Whew... Finally, we can take a break.
engSearchText: Whew... Finally, we can take a break.
jpnChrName: はあ～…… これでやっと一区切りみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
はあ～……
これでやっと一区切りみたいだね。

engChrName: I'm just glad we were able to smack some sense into those idiots when they went crazier than a pom sprouting tits.
engSearchText:
I'm just glad we were able to smack some sense into
those idiots when they went crazier than a pom
sprouting tits.
jpnChrName: ハッ、テンパった馬鹿共を ブチのめせたのは良かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、テンパった馬鹿共を
ブチのめせたのは良かったぜ。

engChrName: There are better ways of putting it! ...Still, I'm pooped.
engSearchText:
There are better ways of putting it! ...Still,
I'm pooped.
jpnChrName: コラコラ。 ……しかし流石に疲れたわね～。
jpnSearchText:
コラコラ。
……しかし流石に疲れたわね～。

engChrName: Same here. As soon as I realized it was over, my stomach started rumbling like crazy.
engSearchText:
Same here. As soon as I realized it was over, my
stomach started rumbling like crazy.
jpnChrName: はい……ホッとしたら お腹空いてきちゃいました……
jpnSearchText:
はい……ホッとしたら
お腹空いてきちゃいました……

engChrName: I know it won't make up for everything you've done, especially in Oración, so we can leave that for some other time...
engSearchText:
I know it won't make up for everything you've done,
especially in Oración, so we can leave that for some
other time...
jpnChrName: そうだ、オラシオンも含めた 打ち上げじゃないけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、オラシオンも含めた
打ち上げじゃないけど……

engChrName: ...but how about we all head to the bistro below your work for a little celebration?
engSearchText:
...but how about we all head to the bistro below your
work for a little celebration?
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちが拠点にしてるっていう ビストロにみんなで行くのはどう？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちが拠点にしてるっていう
ビストロにみんなで行くのはどう？

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?

engChrName: That sounds like a plan to me! I've had my eye on that place for a while.
engSearchText:
That sounds like a plan to me! I've had my eye on
that place for a while.
jpnChrName: おお、そいつはいいな。 前々から気になってた店だし。
jpnSearchText:
おお、そいつはいいな。
前々から気になってた店だし。

engChrName: Heard even the former president's a fan.
engSearchText: Heard even the former president's a fan.
jpnChrName: たしかロックスミス閣下なんかも 贔屓にしてるそうじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
たしかロックスミス閣下なんかも
贔屓にしてるそうじゃないか？

engChrName: Hold on, you two...
engSearchText: Hold on, you two...
jpnChrName: ちょっとジンさん、フィーも……
jpnSearchText: ちょっとジンさん、フィーも……

engChrName: Even our division chief speaks highly of it. I can't say I'm not curious myself.
engSearchText:
Even our division chief speaks highly of it. I can't say
I'm not curious myself.
jpnChrName: 室長も誉めていたが…… ふむ、今更だが私も興味があるな。
jpnSearchText:
室長も誉めていたが……
ふむ、今更だが私も興味があるな。

engChrName: The place where you're staying, Master? Hmm... I'm curious, too.
engSearchText:
The place where you're staying, Master? Hmm...
I'm curious, too.
jpnChrName: 先生が逗留している宿酒場か？ うーん、アタシも興味があるな。
jpnSearchText:
先生が逗留している宿酒場か？
うーん、アタシも興味があるな。

engChrName: Won't we be troubling them by charging in unannounced in such large numbers? It's not an inn.
engSearchText:
Won't we be troubling them by charging in
unannounced in such large numbers? It's not an inn.
jpnChrName: 宿ではなくビストロだそうですけど。 いきなりはご迷惑では？
jpnSearchText:
宿ではなくビストロだそうですけど。
いきなりはご迷惑では？

engChrName: Hmm... It would be best if we asked them first, but the owner is a generous man. He may well accommodate us.
engSearchText:
Hmm... It would be best if we asked them first, but
the owner is a generous man. He may well
accommodate us.
jpnChrName: ふむ、マスター殿も太っ腹ゆえ、 相談すれば応じてくれるかもしれぬ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、マスター殿も太っ腹ゆえ、
相談すれば応じてくれるかもしれぬ。

engChrName: Wait! Even you're on board with this?!
engSearchText: Wait! Even you're on board with this?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、師父（せんせい）まで……！？
jpnSearchText: ちょ、師父（せんせい）まで……！？

engChrName: It's not often we have the chance to go somewhere together, you know.
engSearchText:
It's not often we have the chance to go somewhere
together, you know.
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… でも折角の機会かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
でも折角の機会かもしれませんね。

engChrName: I think it'd be nice to invite Bermotti, too...and maybe some of my classmates, if that's all right.
engSearchText:
I think it'd be nice to invite Bermotti, too...and
maybe some of my classmates, if that's all right.
jpnChrName: ベルモッティさんや先輩たちに 声を掛けても良さそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
ベルモッティさんや先輩たちに
声を掛けても良さそうですし。

engChrName: Oh! Can we invite Saara and Shaheena, too, then? And Inspector Daswani!
engSearchText:
Oh! Can we invite Saara and Shaheena, too, then?
And Inspector Daswani!
jpnChrName: あ、それならサァラさんたちや 警部さんたちもどうでしょうっ？
jpnSearchText:
あ、それならサァラさんたちや
警部さんたちもどうでしょうっ？

engChrName: Works for me. Maybe I'll give Nina and Gotti a call so they can join in on the fun.
engSearchText:
Works for me. Maybe I'll give Nina and Gotti a call
so they can join in on the fun.
jpnChrName: ふふ、いいんじゃない？ ニナに監督も呼んじゃおうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いいんじゃない？
ニナに監督も呼んじゃおうかしら。

engChrName: Then I'll give Essy and Supervisor Giscard a call, too.
engSearchText: Then I'll give Essy and Supervisor Giscard a call, too.
jpnChrName: うーん、エレ姉に親方にも 一応連絡を取ってみようかな。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、エレ姉に親方にも
一応連絡を取ってみようかな。

engChrName: I can see Ashen and the others pitching a fit if they find out they weren't invited, so I'd better let them in on this.
engSearchText:
I can see Ashen and the others pitching a fit if they
find out they weren't invited, so I'd better let them in
on this.
jpnChrName: スルーしたらうるさそうだから アシェンたちにも声を掛けとくか。
jpnSearchText:
スルーしたらうるさそうだから
アシェンたちにも声を掛けとくか。

engChrName: Then I'll reach out to Montmart posthaste.
engSearchText: Then I'll reach out to Montmart posthaste.
jpnChrName: それでは早速モンマルトに 問い合わせるといたしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それでは早速モンマルトに
問い合わせるといたしましょう。

engChrName: Did you HAVE to encourage them? This is gonna be total chaos...
engSearchText:
Did you HAVE to encourage them? This is gonna be
total chaos...
jpnChrName: ってオイ…… どんなカオスにするつもりだ？
jpnSearchText:
ってオイ……
どんなカオスにするつもりだ？

engChrName: My only reason is the one I stated—and you're coming, too, of course.
engSearchText:
My only reason is the one I stated—and you're
coming, too, of course.
jpnChrName: 別に他意はないが── まあ、たまには付き合うがいい。
jpnSearchText:
別に他意はないが──
まあ、たまには付き合うがいい。

engChrName: Does that work for you, too, Elaine?
engSearchText: Does that work for you, too, Elaine?
jpnChrName: エレインもいいな？
jpnSearchText: エレインもいいな？

engChrName: *sigh* I suppose so.
engSearchText: *sigh* I suppose so.
jpnChrName: ふう、私は構わないけれど。
jpnSearchText: ふう、私は構わないけれど。

engChrName: Heehee. Just thinking about it takes me back to our school festival afterparty.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Just thinking about it takes me back to our
school festival afterparty.
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… 何だか学藝祭の打ち上げみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
何だか学藝祭の打ち上げみたいね。

engChrName: There is no way this isn't gonna be way worse...
engSearchText: There is no way this isn't gonna be way worse...
jpnChrName: どう考えても それどころじゃ済まねぇだろ……
jpnSearchText:
どう考えても
それどころじゃ済まねぇだろ……
